name: Miami Heroes Online
description:
Miami Heroes Online is a multiplayer online  shooter game in third person. The game consists of several players sent for the surrounded city of Miami in the year of 2018.
The city is being controlled for Zombies, Reward Hunters and Evil Skulls originating from of Hell. The players' mission is leave in search of weapons and loots in order to defeat other players, while they try to survive at the same time.
